Hotel.name: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun Resort

Address.Address1: KUKULKAN BLVD KM 9.5 LOTE 6 PO BOX 5-479

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Cancun (Avenida Kukulkan), Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun is minutes from Cancun Convention Center and Gaviota Azul Beach. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Forum Beach and Delphinus Dreams.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 602 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and premium TV channels provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and designer toiletries.

Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the resort's 10 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the resort's 10 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Additional amenities at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cancun Convention Center - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Gaviota Azul Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Forum Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Delphinus Dreams - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Caracol Beach - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Forum By The Sea Mall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza Caracol Mall - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Chac Mool Beach - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Cancun Golf Club at Pok Ta Pok - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Tortuga Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Yamil Lu'um Archaeological Zone - 3.2 km / 2 mi
La Isla Shopping Mall - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Tequila Museum - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
Cancun Interactive Aquarium - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Langosta Beach - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi.

The preferred airport for Fiesta Americana Grand Coral Beach Cancun Resort & Spa is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Effective immediately due to Mexico regulations we will no longer accept payment in US Dollars at the Hotels/Resorts. All services shall be in Mexican Pesos. When using a credit or debit card, the charges are being made in Mexican Pesos. Due to this same regulation, we are no longer accepting USD cash as a form of payment or to execute any money exchange; at our hotels/resorts. Guests are required to either use ATM or utilize any bank office nearby.

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $25(including tax) per room, per day will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. The fee is not included in your package price and is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due. For detailed description of what’s included in the mandatory fee please see hotel policies.

The Municipal Government of Benito Juarez will be charging all guests in the area of Cancun and Puerto Morelos an Environmental Sanitation Tax of a minimum $30.00 Mexican Pesos (approx. $1.60 USD) per room per night. This amount is not included in your vacation price and will be collected at your hotel. These funds are being used to protect, maintain and conserve the extraordinary beauty of the area.

Guests are required to either use ATM or utilize any bank office nearby.

Message.Text:
A PARTIR DEL 19 DE DICEMBRE LAS RESERVAS CONTARAN CON UN RESORT FEE DE 25 USD POR HABITACION Y NOCHE DE PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

Essential Information:
IMPORTANT: Kindly be advised that for stays from December 19th, 2015 a Daily Resort Fee of $25 USD (tax inclusive) per room, per night, will be added to the room rate, and it will reflected at the resort within the final guest´s incidentals bill (extra-charges), which guests are due to pay on full prior to check-out.
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room No: 1

Kids Stay and Eat Free Promotion:
Book a stay in any room type and 2 kids ages 12 and under eat free when staying with 2 adults using existing bedding (maximum 2 adults and 2 kids per room). Kids 12 and under eat free from Kids Menu (when parents eating from regular menu). Restrictions apply for kids between 5 and 12 when booking All Inclusive Program. Other restrictions may apply.,Guests must provide a valid form of government regulated identification (eg. passport, ID card, driver’s license, etc.) upon check-in.,The property requires a refundable security deposit upon check-in.,An additional charge will be applied if the number of guests at check-in is more than the number of persons in the booking.,All special requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.,Pets are strictly not allowed at the property.,A property fee will be collected upon check-in.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
